entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Brantford
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:12 AM EST Thursday 09 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: 2.9°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Brantford Municipal Airport 2:00 PM EST Thursday 09 February 2023
Temperature: 2.9°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.4 kPa falling
Humidity: 98 %
Dewpoint: 2.6°C
Wind: ENE 12 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 3

entry.title: Thursday: A few showers. High 11.
entry.summary: Showers. Fog patches dissipating late this afternoon. Amount 15 to 25 mm. Wind south 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming southwest 50 gusting to 70 late this afternoon. High 11. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 2:07 PM EST Thursday 09 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: A few rain showers or flurries. Low plus 1.
entry.summary: A few rain showers ending near midnight then cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries or rain showers. Wind southwest 50 km/h gusting to 80. Low plus 1. Forecast issued 2:07 PM EST Thursday 09 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. High plus 2. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind west 40 km/h gusting to 60 diminishing to 20 late in the afternoon. High plus 2. Wind chill minus 8 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 2:07 PM EST Thursday 09 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 9. POP 60%
